channel.title: Softlayer_locale_country on SoftLayer API
channel.description: Recent content in Softlayer_locale_country on SoftLayer API

item.title: SoftLayer_Locale_Country
item.description: SoftLayer_Locale_Country Service Datatype Description This service provides methods to retrieve country locale information. Methods getAllVatCountryCodesAndVatIdRegexes getAvailableCountries getCountries getCountriesAndStates getObject Retrieve a SoftLayer_Locale_Country record. getStates Retrieve states that belong to this country. isEuropeanUnionCountry

item.title: SoftLayer_Locale_Country
item.description: SoftLayer_Locale_Country Datatype Description Local isEuropeanUnionFlag Binary flag denoting if this country is part of the European Union Type: integer isoCodeAlphaThree Type: string longName Type: string postalCodeFormat Type: string postalCodeRequiredFlag Type: integer shortName Type: string vatIdRegex Type: string Relational states States that belong to this country.

item.title: getAllVatCountryCodesAndVatIdRegexes
item.description: SoftLayer_Locale_Country::getAllVatCountryCodesAndVatIdRegexes Overview This method is to get the collection of VAT country codes and VAT ID Regexes. Parameters Name Type Description Required Headers authenticate Optional Headers Return Values SoftLayer_Container_Collection_Locale_VatCountryCodeAndFormat[]

item.title: getAvailableCountries
item.description: SoftLayer_Locale_Country::getAvailableCountries Overview Use this method to retrieve a list of countries and locale information available to the current user. Parameters Name Type Description Required Headers authenticate Optional Headers SoftLayer_Locale_CountryObjectMask SoftLayer_ObjectMask Return Values SoftLayer_Locale_Country[]

item.title: getCountries
item.description: SoftLayer_Locale_Country::getCountries Overview Use this method to retrieve a list of countries and locale information such as country code and state/provinces. Parameters Name Type Description Required Headers authenticate Optional Headers SoftLayer_Locale_CountryObjectMask SoftLayer_ObjectMask Return Values SoftLayer_Locale_Country[]

item.title: getCountriesAndStates
item.description: SoftLayer_Locale_Country::getCountriesAndStates Overview Parameters Name Type Description usFirstFlag boolean Required Headers authenticate Optional Headers Return Values SoftLayer_Container_Collection_Locale_CountryCode[]

item.title: getObject
item.description: SoftLayer_Locale_Country::getObject Overview Parameters Name Type Description Required Headers SoftLayer_Locale_CountryInitParameters authenticate Optional Headers SoftLayer_Locale_CountryObjectMask SoftLayer_Locale_CountryObjectFilter SoftLayer_ObjectMask Return Values SoftLayer_Locale_Country

item.title: getStates
item.description: SoftLayer_Locale_Country::getStates Overview Retrieve states that belong to this country. Parameters Name Type Description Required Headers SoftLayer_Locale_CountryInitParameters authenticate Optional Headers SoftLayer_Locale_CountryObjectMask SoftLayer_Locale_CountryObjectFilter resultLimit SoftLayer_ObjectMask Return Values SoftLayer_Locale_StateProvince[]

item.title: isEuropeanUnionCountry
item.description: SoftLayer_Locale_Country::isEuropeanUnionCountry Overview Parameters Name Type Description iso2CountryCode string Two-letter country code (ISO 3166-1 alpha-2) Required Headers authenticate Optional Headers Return Values boolean
